properties.name: Eroded old historical billboard
properties.description: Posted by HeavyjPass this on the way to "Cheese Days." Toledo\'s annual festival where myself and about fifty other drunk folks float the Cowlitz river every year. Man do we piss off the fisherman.

properties.name: Where I had a bike wreck (one of many)
properties.description: Posted by Heavyj I had just turned 16 and was riding my first real racing bike, a gray Serotta with a mish-mash of Campy and Sugino parts. I worked all summer at McDonalds to pay for it. It was awesome. My parents wanted me to wear a helmet so they made me a deal that they would pay for it if I rode it in training. I said sure but would always ditch it under our VW van when I headed out for a training ride. On this day I t-boned a Camaro that failed to signal, broke my left arm so badly that I had to pick my left hand up with my right (it was only attached by skin). My right hand hit the ground so hard that I was left with a "burst wound" on my index finger (think hotdog in a microwave too long). I moved myself to the grass by the side of the street and laid down, gave my phone number to someone and waited for the ambulance. When my parents backed the car out of the driveway there was my helmet, my Mom supposedly fainted. Amazingly, the bike was fine.
